title: Deliver Custom Admin Training
description: A consultant needs to deliver a training session specifically for the customer's new system administrators.

tasks.description: Prepare a custom training curriculum focused on admin-level tasks like user management, security settings, and billing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant creates a tailored training agenda and slide deck.

tasks.description: Conduct the live, remote training session for the customer's administrators.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant effectively delivers the training material and answers questions.

tasks.description: Follow up after the session with a recording of the training and links to relevant documentation.
